title: Horsefly
description: Jewel is terrified of everything -- especially the horses on her ranch. But when her grandfather puts the fate of a scrawny newborn foal in her hands, she has no choice but to care for the sad little thing, whom she names Bug. As the two grow fond of each other, Jewel discovers an extraordinary secret about Bug -- he can fly! Unfortunately, someone else has discovered the foal's secret, too. Can Jewel overcome her fears in order to save her best friend?
author: Alice Hoffman
